hints.content: Let's use the place value blocks to help us solve.

Let's put our tens and ones together.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/f858e2c317cb01cd5d5194105088728e707ff1d3)

 We have $7\text{ tens}$ and $13\text{ ones}$.

We can put our $13\text{ ones}$ together to make $1\text{ ten}$ and $3\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/ba4ad5ab0c07329f14a846321efbb1896d25c1f8)

In all, there are $8\text{ tens}$ and $3\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/86a80b9d30edab2956b3126d8cf7964141d0428d)

$8\text{ tens} + 3\text{ ones}= 83$

question.content:
**Add.**  
*Hint: Use the place value blocks to help solve $54+ 29$.*

[[☃ numeric-input 2]] $\Large{=54+ 29}$
